metadata.title: CVE-2020-24994 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Stack overflow in the parse_tag function in libass/ass_parse.c in libass before 0.15.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or remote code execution via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-24994` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass9 - 0.15.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.15.0-2').
